text: Şenol Birol (25 November 1937 – 3 March 2022) was a Turkish footballer. He played as a forward. Birol played for Beşiktaş and Fenerbahçe. He also played for the national team from 1960 until 1963. His played career lasted from 1958 until 1970. Birol was born in Rize, Turkey. Birol died on 3 March 2022 in Rize at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkish football managers
title: Şenol Birol
